title: My email for this account is not showing me any messages from riot so i cannot change the email addr
body: My email for this account is not showing me any messages from riot so i cannot change the email address, i can show proof i own the email, idk what wrong with my inbox so i made another email but i cant swap over unless the code comes through which it is not someone help?

replies.body:
Be sure that the messages aren't ending up in your *spam* or *filtered inbox*. If they aren't sitting in there, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll assist you in sorting this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
